name: Hockey Games 3D
description:
If you love hockey or have never played it, then this is the game for you!
Even if you do not know what hockey is and why it is needed, it's a game for you!
Do you like NHL (NHL) or KHL? Do not pass by!

This game is a collection of different games to your taste, at the moment there are the following games:
-Hockey from the first person (1st) and from third person (3rd) - the ability to control the puck.
-Hockey Puzzle - hit the goal of the hockey gate and shoot the goal.
- Hockey GoalTender!
-Boxing Game. Beta.
Features:
1. Three-dimensional beautiful and dynamic graphics!
2. Interesting and unusual gameplay!
3. A variety of hockey games (which will eventually replenish)!
4. The ability to play from the first person and from a third person!
5. Atmospheric game!
